programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Taiga: The Frozen Forest
programme.desc: Containing one third of the world's trees, the frozen forests of the Taiga are the lungs of the planet. This great forest spans across shores of the Pacific, sheltering some of the Earth's most majestic animals, and some of its most secretive.

programme.title: Wildest India: Western Ghats: Monsoon Mountains
programme.desc: See how the Himalayas run across 2,500km of north India.The Himalayas' highlands offer little direct refuge to humans. /Then, learn about the western Ghats. A spine of mountains that lay claim to being one of the most bio-diverse places in the world.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Namibia: Sands of Time
programme.desc: Namibia is an arid, rough land. However, it has been inhabited for thousands of years, by people as well as animals, and shows no sign of losing popularity with either.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Falkland Islands: Penguin Paradise
programme.desc: The Falkland's bleak, battered, and windswept archipelago lies 460 km from the South American mainland. Rugged mountains and expansive pristine coastline are a unique home for wildlife  especially for one of the world's most iconic flightless birds.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Rainforest

programme.desc: In tonight’s test, all teams must compete to create the ultimate meat and three veg meal.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Double Helix
programme.desc: DNA Analysis: With the advent of DNA analysis, just a few microscopic cells found at a crime scene can be used to put a murder behind bars.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Written In Bone
programme.desc: At the scene of a murder, sometimes the victim provides the only clues to their killer. Forensic anthropologists use skeletal remains to decipher the clues written in the bones.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Missing
programme.desc: Approximately 1.8 million Americans are reported missing each year. Some are runaways who find their way home, but others simply disappear. When foul play is suspected, investigators turn to forensics to find the missing.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Silent Killers
programme.desc: Weeks pass as forensic investigators search for even the smallest clues, only to find what they feared in their own backyard. In Canada, two people die suddenly of unknown causes, and their deaths may not be as coincidental as they first appear.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Partners In Crime
programme.desc: They say that a burden shared is a burden halved, but when partners team up to commit murder, the weight of their guilt remains just as heavy. Investigators must rely on forensic science to capture partners in crime.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs must identify ice cream flavours in a blind taste test challenge; actress Meredith Baxter and Olympic swimmer Haley Anderson attend the dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining six chefs receive visits from their families, but we find out what will happen when they are roped in to help with the day's challenge.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay's chef challenge continues. After a shaky dinner service, a furious Gordon is forced to take over from the team. See who will take the fall as the final draws nearer.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay's gruelling challenge nears its climax. The chefs take turns leading the kitchen for dinner service. Find out who will make the final and who will fall at the final hurdle.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay's extreme cookery challenge reaches its climax as the final two hopefuls battle it out for a coveted head chef's job. Who will Gordon choose as this year's winner?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay is bringing back former black jacket chefs to compete in an all-star season for the biggest prize in Hell's Kitchen history.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian builds through a major issue with the roof.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian tries to bring it all together with the side panel design

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian attempts to make a mold of the entire car.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian puts it all on the line to see if the custom car mold works.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian runs into issues as he attempts some last minute changes.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: In the season finale, Ian tries to bring it all together.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian and his most ambitious client break all the rules and build the ultimate boat-inspired, open-aired cruiser. (Part 1)

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian and his most ambitious client continue the ultimate open-aired cruiser build and debut it a top West Coast car show. (Part 2)

programme.title: Andromeda: Vault of the Heavens
programme.desc: Dylan hears voices beckoning him to a planet of "fire and ice."

programme.title: Andromeda: Deep Midnight's Voice
programme.desc: While caught in a battle between two Nietzschean prides, the crew captures a hostile who claims that his pride possesses a map of the slipstream.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Illusion of Majesty
programme.desc: A wrong turn after exiting a slipstream sends the Andromeda into the Prolon system. They rescue an escape pod from certain disaster, but the pride wants it back.

programme.title: Andromeda: Twilight of the Idols
programme.desc: The crew seeks for a lost colony of Nietzscheans and discovers another crew that has been secretly helping them.

programme.title: Andromeda: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.desc: The crew installs a new AI in a new Commonwealth battleship, and naturally things don't go as they should.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost for Words
programme.desc: Spirited teenager Jayne Furlong dreamed of becoming a child psychologist - instead, she ended up a prostitute. In 1993, 17 year old Jayne vanished from her patch on Auckland's Karangahape Road.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Psychics Revealed - Special
programme.desc: Behind the scenes with the psychics on the show.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Blood Money
programme.desc: Psychics Kelvin Cruickshank (NZ) and Deb Webber (Aus) investigate the unsolved murder of Lower Hutt pensioner 91 year old George Engelbrecht. In 1979, a burglar broke into George's home and beat the old man to death in his bed.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Lie of the Land
programme.desc: Sue Nicholson and Deb Webber investigate one of the most complex and intriguing cases ever featured - did Waikato man Jason Dark commit suicide or was he murdered, as his family believes?

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Assassination of John Newman
programme.desc: John Paul Newman was a member of the New South Wales state parliament and a member of the seat of Cabramatta.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Gonzales Family Murders
programme.desc: On July 10, 2001, Sef Gonzales murdered his sister Clodine, 18, mother Mary Loiva Josephine, 43, and his father Teddy, 46, in their North Ryde home.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Night Caller: Eric Edgar Cooke
programme.desc: In 1959, the carefree culture of Perth changed forever when a plague of crime hit the city. By early 1963, the crime wave had escalated to serial murder.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Disappearance of Donald Mackay
programme.desc: A small group of local criminals with mafia connections were making vast fortunes in the famous NSW Riverina irrigation district from marijuana plantations.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No More Grannies / The Granny Killer
programme.desc: We delve into the twisted mind of one of Australia's most prolific serial murderers. John Wayne Glover - The Granny Killer, was truly an evil man.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: If You Build It
programme.desc: Stevie locks horns with Sandra, but finds herself helping Sandra through a crisis.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Out of Time
programme.desc: Stevie faces the biggest decision of her life: should she tell her daughter Rose who her real mother is?

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Betwixt and Between
programme.desc: Rose discovers her life is a lie and Stevie pays a terrible price.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Truth or Dare
programme.desc: Predators are everywhere on Drovers Run as Dave’s brother drops from the sky.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The King And I
programme.desc: Jodi’s world is turned upside down when she receives a birthday gift from the late Jack McLeod.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: All Ghosts On Deck
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Louisville, Kentucky to investigate one of the oldest operating steamboats in the United States, The Belle of Louisville.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Due Date With Death
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Rochester, New York to investigate the Rochester Public Library's 15 years of claims. There's reason to believe that two deaths associated with the building could be behind the activity.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Tunnels of Terror
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Lockport, New York to investigate an underworld of tunnels. It holds a mystery of possible murder, multiple deaths and frightening phenomena. What stories do the spirits of Lockport Caves want to tell?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Congress Theater
programme.desc: TAPS heads to Chicago Illinois to investigate a Chicago landmark for nearly a century, the Congress Theater.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Betsy Ross House
programme.desc: A family living in a Revolutionary War era house in Pennsylvania fears for their child and urgently calls on the TAPS team for help.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: 1st Edition Apparition
programme.desc: TAPS is revisiting Edith Wharton's home, The Mount, in Lenox, Massachusetts. It's believed Edith andher husband could be behind increased activity since the team's last investigation in 2008.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fathers in Law
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bosco the Clown
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Destiny Love
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Boomerang Becca
programme.desc: When Rebecca returns home from her internship in Los Angeles, the Robertson family plans a big surprise party to welcome her back. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si gets sick, he seeks the help of Ms. Kay to take care of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie's Number Two
programme.desc: When Willie is looking to hire a new assistant, Korie insists he interviews her cousin, JD. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si spends the day over at Phil and Kay's, Jep stops by with the kids to keep them away from Jessica, who has taken ill.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Life of Si
programme.desc: After seeing footage Jep shot using a GoPro, Si decides he wants to use the camera to record a day in his life. But when Si gets on the guys nerves while they're hunting, they kick him and his GoPros out of the blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: From Duck 'til Dawn
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work, Jase and Willie head off to disarm it.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Burger Commander
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: G.I. Si
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old G.I. Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier. To settle the score, Willie and Jase head out to the woods with their friends and children for a paintball match.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jase and the Argonauts
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working. But when Jase thinks this is unfair, he takes matters into his own hands and finds a better object to use as motivation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Playhouse
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep themselves. But the playhouse ends up looking more like a military-style duck blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Rossland and Nelson Search and Rescue risk avalanche threats to recover a ski fatality in the backcountry.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson Search and Rescue rings in the New Year with three back-to-back missions.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: White water rescue rookies in Nelson BC get a taste of reality when their swift-water training course becomes an actual mission, one they will never forget.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams go deep for a missing subject in the Upana cave system on Vancouver Island.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR rookie Sybilla Helms is put to the test with a real mission.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent-Harrison Search and Rescue deal with darkness and death on a late night callout.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Parks Canada Search and Rescue deal with injured hikers and bad news bears.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In Southeastern British Columbia, Columbia Valley Search and Rescue scour the rugged backcountry for a missing field researcher.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: On Vancouver Island’s challenging 75 kilometre West Coast hiking Trail, heavy fog hinders Parks Canada rescue efforts.

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Ex
programme.desc: Andwela and Nicole came together after cheating on their spouses. Nicole feels like their marriage has been severely damaged due to his disloyalty and him trash talking her to his ex. Can this couple figure it out?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drunk in Love
programme.desc: Cheryl Kaplan is fed up with Cody Green’s drinking. She says Cody is unaffectionate and believes he’s cheating. The final straw was when they lost their home and he pressured her to leave behind her daughter in Ohio to live with his family.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Super Freak
programme.desc: Khasha says Jermaine is always too busy for her and doesn't respect her. Jermaine says his young girlfriend wants sex all the time and is extremely messy! Can Judge Toler help them find a middle ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Can't Buy Love
programme.desc: Chimira gets lavish vacations, gifts and a designer wardrobe from Bennie, but suspects he is cheating on her. Bennie says she should be grateful for her good life. Can Bennie learn to give his time and support instead of luxuries and an empty home?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Old Town Road
programme.desc: Jennifer says Josh's lies have left her and their family homeless. He has made many hurtful decisions like selling her car and dumping her dog while she was giving birth to their son. Can he pave the way for a future?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Track Me Down
programme.desc: Briana is suspicious of Geovani because she claims he is way too sexual and can’t keep his hands off her. She thinks that if he has that much drive for her, how could he not have it for other women.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Once a Cheater Always a Cheater
programme.desc: Alyssia says Devonte is a serial cheater, but wants to save their relationship. He says she's insecure and stalks his social media. They share a child, but Devonte doesn't want to commit if she won't change. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Down in the DM
programme.desc: Clifford feels that Asia is always searching for things that aren’t there. Asia says she is done with Clifford and the way he uses social media to flirt and cheat with women. Can Judge Lynn Toler help put a stop to the arguing?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhan’s bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.desc: A worried mother calls the Paranormal Research Society to help her son Matthew, a boy who sees dead people. Matthew's story strikes a chord with team leader Ryan Buell who also experienced paranormal activity as a child.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Family Ties
programme.desc: Jimmie is haunted by the apparition of a mysterious old woman who peers at him in the bathroom of his family's Petersburg, VA home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shadow Caster
programme.desc: PRS investigates an Alabama home where clients, Georgiana and her two daughters, are so terrified, they moved out after only 18 months. They have seen shadow figures, been touched and have a recorded EVP stating, "Look at me, get out of here."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Get Out of This House
programme.desc: When an aggressive spirit stalks a young family, PRS is called in to investigate. When it is determined that the source of the haunting may have been unknowingly invited in, Ryan races to identify and hopefully defeat the entity before it's too late.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice
programme.desc: Brenda is terrified by a dark hooded figure spotted in her West Virginia home. The same entity allegedly tormented her late husband. PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger help Brenda before she slips into the same abyss as her late husband.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oakwell House
programme.desc: The team investigate Oakwell House near Leeds, which was built by ancestors of Fred Batt. In 1684, William Batt returned unexpectedly from a trip to London but vanished leaving a bloody footprint. A demon dog has been seen in the grounds.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Tatton Hall
programme.desc: Something about Tatton Old Hall keeps bringing the Most Haunted team back. Something happens that stops two of the team entering, a poltergeist causes confusion and the team get a clear voice from beyond the veil.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Tivoli Venue
programme.desc: A well-known venue for accomplished as well as up and coming bands The Tivoli Venue boasts many a ghost. In this episode one of the team gets a warning from the other side that reduces them to tears and something seems to be stalking the team.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 1
programme.desc: Part 1. The upper floors of Wentworth House are a maze of corridors and rooms and the team have one night to investigate as many as possible. With one whistling spirit, groans and loud noises the team are shaken to their core.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The underbelly of this great house is a sharp contrast to its upper grandeur. Some members of the team are forced to run while other are lost in the labyrinth of tunnels and passageways pursued by something unnatural.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Close Encounters of the Heavenly Kind

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Keep Smiling
programme.desc: Jonathan must help his own widow regain her love for life.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Last Assignment

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Bind the Wounds

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Heaven on Earth

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica

programme.title: World's Greatest: Rivers
programme.desc: Rivers flow freely - beautiful and powerful waterways that underscore the melody of life. As they meander through the landscape, they shape it, wearing down ranges and deepening valleys, eventually flowing out into the sea.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mega Cities
programme.desc: Mega Cities provide a bustling home to populations of over 10 million. Travel from the high-density living of Shanghai and Bangkok to the sprawling cities of Delhi and Mexico City, each the backdrop for dynamic cultures.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Marine Animals
programme.desc: From the surprises of colorful reef characters to effervescent penguins, killer sharks, and regal whales, dive into the places where nature reveals itself in some of its most marvelous and bizarre forms.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Nearshore Islands
programme.desc: Some of the world’s greatest islands are so close that they blend in with the mainland. But regardless of their size and origins, they are often the islands we are drawn to the most, each forging their own unique identity.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Jungle Animals
programme.desc: Encounter gorillas and orangutans, killer tree-dwelling pythons, delightful monkeys, awe-inspiring tigers, and millions of land-dwelling red crabs in Australia, the islands of Southeast Asia, Africa, and the Amazon.

programme.title: Arthur: The Blackout/Mei Lin Takes a Stand
programme.desc: It's a hot day in Elwood City, and a total blackout leaves its residents without electricity! Will Arthur and DW survive without AC and TV? Binky's baby sister Mei-Lin isn't keen on learning to walk and would rather stick to crawling.

programme.title: Arthur: All About D.W./Blockheads
programme.desc: When Emily gets the starring role in the preschool play, D.W. is beside herself with jealousy. She should be Little Red Riding Hood, not Tree #2! Then, D.W. and Emily are upset when they get stuck with the blocks at playtime.

programme.title: Arthur: My Music Rules/That's A Baby Show!
programme.desc: It's the duel of the century as cellist Yo-Yo Ma faces jazz saxophonist Joshua Redman in the toughest gig of their careers at the Elwood City Library! Then, will Arthur be exposed as a baby show lover?

programme.title: Arthur: The Agent of Change/D.W. Unties the Knot
programme.desc: The latest animated hit movie about a boy and his truck has left Muffy and Francine disappointed. Why doesn't there seem to be any cool female characters on screen? After watching "The Wedding Channel," D.W. wants to get married!

programme.title: Arthur's First Day
programme.desc: It's finally the first day of fourth grade and Arthur couldn't be more excited - until he learns Buster is in another class! Meanwhile, D.W. is nervous for her first day of kindergarten. Will Arthur and D.W. be able to make new friends?

programme.title: Arthur: Hic or Treat/Mr. Alwaysright
programme.desc: D.W. gets a case of the hiccups that just won't go away. Will she have them for the rest of her life and set the world record? It seems that Brain is always right about everything and it's really starting to get on Buster's nerves.

programme.title: Arthur: Cents-less/Buster the Lounge Lizard
programme.desc: Mr. Ratburn decides it's time for his class to learn a little about money. For the entire weekend, no one in the class can spend a cent. Buster has the brand-new Dark Bunny Dark Buggy, complete with grappling hook and voice commands!

programme.title: Arthur: Falafelosophy/The Great Lint Rush
programme.desc: Sue Ellen tries her hand at writing and illustrating a graphic novel. Then, Mr. Toad is back! And he's ready to corner the Sock Market, leaving everyone in Elwood City barefoot and bereft.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: In WWII's final months, Allies discover Nazi death camps, prompting a sweeping denazification of Germany post-war. Nuremberg trials convict top Nazis. Former Nazis are employed by the West in the Cold War struggle against the Soviet Union.

programme.title: War Story: Where Hell is: The Leopold and the Scheldt
programme.desc: The Allies liberated Antwerp, the world’s largest deep-water port, on 4 September 1944, but it could only be accessed via the Scheldt Estuary, the perfect place for the Germans to make a stand.

programme.title: War Story: Falaise, the corridor of death
programme.desc: The Canadian army played the pivotal role in closing the Falaise Gap and ensuring Allied victory in the Normandy Campaign in August 1944.

programme.title: War Story: D-Day plus 1
programme.desc: The Canadian stand against the 12th SS Panzer Division Hitlerjugend immediately after D-Day allowed the Allies to switch to the offensive and truly begin the liberation of Europe.

programme.title: War Story: Surviving Dieppe
programme.desc: The Dieppe assault of 19 August 1942 is the worst day in Canadian military history: in just 8 hours, 907 Canadians were killed. For 2,000 of their comrades, nearly three years of incarceration in German prison camps followed.

programme.title: War Story: Whistle for a Tiffy
programme.desc: From D-Day, Tactical Air Force fighter-bombers played a pivotal role in Allied battlefield success; Canadian soldiers knew they could always “whistle for a Tiffy”.

programme.title: War Story: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: Royal Canadian Air Force bombing operations play a crucial role in disrupting German infrastructure ahead of the Normandy invasion of June 1944. In the process, dozens of Canadian airmen are forced to bail out over occupied Belgium and France.

programme.title: War Story: Not One Step Back: The Battle of Stalingrad
programme.desc: In the summer of 1942, the Germans advance to seize the rich oilfields of the Caucasus. In their path, the city of Stalingrad, its Soviet defenders personally ordered by Stalin to “take not one step back".

programme.title: War Story: Buchenwald Airmen
programme.desc: For two months in 1944, 168 Allied airmen were shot down over occupied France, betrayed to the Gestapo by the same collaborator, transported to the Nazi concentration and slave labour camp Buchenwald.

programme.title: War Story: The Last Ship: The Sinking of the Esquimalt
programme.desc: On 16 April 1945, a mere three weeks before German surrender, the submarine fired a single torpedo that sank the last Canadian naval vessel lost to enemy action.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Southern sweetheart Kelsie is madly in love with her online Romeo, Brandon. But after years of endless excuses about meeting up, Kelsie recruits Nev and Max to find who Brandon really is. (S6, ep14)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Esther & Theo
programme.desc: Esther's finally found her match in Theo. But he always refuses to video call. So it's up to Julia and Oobah to find out if Theo is who he says he is. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Brittany finds love online with Bryon, a marine who may get deployed again to Iraq, she seeks Nev and Max's help before she runs out of time to discover if the perfect military man is real.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Stephanie & David
programme.desc: Catfish brings together couples who've interacted solely through screens. In this edition, Stephanie searches for the man she's been talking to in an unseen episode.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Rod & Ebony
programme.desc: Rod met Ebony on a dating web site four years ago, now it's time for the two to meet in person. Is Ebony who she says she is? What will happen when they meet in real life for the first time? (S1, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Former model Jayme has learned that her online boyfriend is not only fake, but appears to be catfishing other women too! Nev and Max help find the catfish to put an end to his deception. (S5, ep13)

programme.title: The City: Sleeping With The Frenemy
programme.desc: Olivia's working at ELLE Magazine, but meets her match in co-worker Erin Kaplan. Whitney returns to work for Kelly Cutrone, &amp; an old friend's in town, looking to crash with her. (S1, ep14)

programme.title: The City: Working Girls
programme.desc: Whitney wonders if working with a friend is a good idea when Roxy steps out of line on day one. Olivia wins Joe Zee's approval on a new project at ELLE, but Erin isn't impressed. (S1, ep15)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Shore Shower
programme.desc: MVP is back, resulting in a near threesome for Vinny. The girls struggle to keep the baby shower a surprise for Nicole, and Vinny is nervous about Jionni seeing him at the party. (S6, ep10)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Awkward!
programme.desc: Vinny talks to Jionni and they resolve their differences, leaving Vin and Nicole free to resume their friendship. Meanwhile, Mike finally acknowledges the mistakes he made in the past. (S6, ep11)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Raining Men & Meatballs
programme.desc: The Meatballs hold auditions to find a temporary party pal for Deena. Mike reveals to the roommates that he used to be a stripper and they coax him into showing his stuff. (S6, ep12)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Family Vacation: Heartbreak Hotel
programme.desc: Ronnie worries about his baby's well-being when he gets news about Jen, Vinny misses Pauly D while he's out of town, and Angelina shocks the roommates when she pays a visit.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Why Did Josh Kill?
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Maddie Clifton of Jacksonville, Florida went outside to play and never came back. Seven days later a city-wide search led to the home of Josh Phillips, a 14-year-old neighbor, where Maddie's body was found under the boy's waterbed.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Colonel's Wife
programme.desc: Ret. Col. George Maracek, a 69-year-old former Green Beret who served in Korea and Vietnam, has been charged with the 1991 murder of his Thai wife Viparet. He maintains that he is innocent.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the Kalamazoo, Michigan's cold case unit's investigation of the September 1994 disappearance of Khristine Smith, a seemingly happy wife and mother.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Love, Hate & Obsession
programme.desc: In the investigation of the murder of a one-time millionaire, both his ex-wife and his son are suspects.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: When a 17-year-old girl breaks up with her abusive boyfriend, he snaps and breaks into her bedroom to attack her.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Long Island Serial Killer
programme.desc: A report on the disappearance of Shannan Gilbert, near Gilgo Beach, New York. The search for Shannan led to the discovery of a total of ten bodies in the scrub brush of Gilgo Beach, leading police to suspect the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: To impress a girl, Jon takes her to see a dangerous game show.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Jon’s niece has to be retrieved by Garfield and Odie. Garfield gets confidence from a motivational speaker.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Skyway Robbery/The Bunny Rabbits Coming/Close Encounters of the Garfield Kind
programme.desc: Jon decides to fly Swindler Airlines to Miami./A mysterious message arrives./A friendly alien lands in Jon's backyard.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Squeak Previews/U.S Acres: Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Wade/A Tall Tale
programme.desc: Two mice critics review a documentary./Wade is mistakenly hypnotized to turn into a monster./The network insists that Nermal tell a story.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Fraidy Cat/U.S. Acres: Shell Shocked Sheldon/Nothing to Sneeze At
programme.desc: Garfield and Odie watch a horror film./Orson decides to hatch Sheldon./Garfield has a sneezing attack.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield tests the audience. Orson offers his version of “The Rooser.”

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Binky Gets Cancelled Again/Orson's Diner/Flat Tired
programme.desc: Binky loses his show to The Buddy Bears./Orson and Wade open a diner./Garfield is too tired to do the show.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Weighty Problem/U.S. Acres: The Worm Turns/Good Cat, Bad Cat
programme.desc: Garfield tampers with the new talking scale./Booker's hunt for worms comes to a stop./Garfield's good and bad side battle for control.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Legend of the Lake/Double-Oh Orson/The Black Book
programme.desc: Garfield lectures a group about a famous water voyage./Orson imagines himself a famous secret agent./Jon gives Garfield his "little black book" to hide.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield's Moving Experience/U.S. Acres: Wade: You're Afraid/Good Mousekeeping
programme.desc: Garfield decides to move away from home./Orson hypnotizes Wade./Garfield must rid the house of mice.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Spy
programme.desc: NATO's missile defense system plans, mapped on two separate overlays for security reasons, are the target of a Central European spy organization.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Game of Chess
programme.desc: Recovering a million dollars in gold bullion is the job of the IMF.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Emerald
programme.desc: The IMF is assigned to recover microfilm plans for manipulating international gold reserves.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Condemned
programme.desc: Jim Phelps comes to the aid of a personal friend.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Counterfeiter
programme.desc: Destroying a drug ring is the task of the IMF.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Town
programme.desc: IMF leader Jim Phelps is marked for murder.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Big Brother Rusty
programme.desc: Barney's excited to find out that Rusty's family is adopting a new baby girl from China; however, Rusty feels differently. He's not sure if he's going to be a good brother, and he doesn't know much about China.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Look What I Can Do
programme.desc: Barney's friends are playing a fun game of "I Can Do" where they each share something they can do. When BJ suggests having an "I Can Do" show, Baby Bop becomes worried.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: At Home in the Park
programme.desc: The children work together to make a bird house. They are happy to learn that the bird will have lots of company; many animals make their homes in the park too!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Making a Move
programme.desc: Welcome to the neighborhood! Anna has just moved to the neighborhood and is missing her old friends. Barney and his friends help her discover that moving is an adventure with new places to explore and new friends to meet.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Best In Show - Ducks And Fish

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jen at Work

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Voluntary Commitment

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Brennan is upset with Adam, who tells him that he was entrusted to keep a secret and leaves after talking to that person. The man is looking for someone and is willing to kill anyone to get to that person.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team goes undercover to investigate unexplained deaths in a prison.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Shalimar is sent undercover in a deadly high-tech assassination ring, to find why they want Adam dead.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team steps in to protect a main prosecution witness whose life has been threatened prior to the trial.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A mysterious tribunal finds Adam guilty of trying to dominate the world with his super-mutants and sentences him to death, sending the rest of the team on a mission to save him.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team is on the trail of a pyromaniac mutant who is causing mayhem, while Shalimar is forced to set aside her fear of fire to save Emma.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Take No Prisoners
programme.desc: The ANA negotiate amnesty for all resistance members, Liam tries to convince resistance member Halley Simmons to take the offer. Sandoval uses parasites to make volunteers do suicide missions against the resistance.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Second Wave
programme.desc: The Taelons decide to leave Earth when it appears that the Jiridians are invading. Meanwhile, a group of Resistance prisoners saved from the mother ship include several disguised Jiridians who are causing trouble for Liam and Renee.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Essence
programme.desc: Renee's brother has PTSD. In a desperate effort to help him, she agrees to let him undergo special treatment. The treatment removes his emotion. The project is overseen by Sandoval and the emotion they take is given to Da'an.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Phantom Companion
programme.desc: While on board the mothership, Renee sustains an injury and while being treated, she gets pulled into the walls and disappears.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dream Stalker
programme.desc: Street asks Liam to help a friend who's arrested for the murder of a man he hated. Liam talks to him and he claims that he dreamed of killing him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Lost Generation
programme.desc: A CVI malfunctions and kills a soon-to-be father. The investigation leads Liam and Renee to a fertility clinic. Renee finds out she is infertile and suspects that Taelon technology is affecting worldwide fertility.

programme.title: The Lost World: Tapestry
programme.desc: Challenger is taken captive by a WWI transport pilot guarding a crashed plane full of stolen iridium ingots. He, Roxton, and Marguerite relive their deepest secrets, each connected to the cargo.

programme.title: The Lost World: Legacy
programme.desc: An old enemy returns with a powerful artifact that could give him total power over the plateau. Veronica believes that her mother's pendant is leading her back to her parents.

programme.title: The Lost World: Trapped
programme.desc: An explosion in the jungle leaves Marguerite and Roxton trapped in a cavern, and Challenger with a case of amnesia that erases his memory of them. Finn helps Veronica uncover more of her past.

programme.title: The Lost World: Heart of the Storm
programme.desc: A strange phenomena brings a cavalcade of dangers-spanning time and space-to the plateau, threatening its very existence. Veronica believes she must use the Trion to save her friends.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Journey Begins
programme.desc: With proof that prehistoric creatures may still be living, a group led by Professor George Challenger is assembled to go on an expedition to uncover more.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Sue Holderness and John Challis bargain hunt with Charles Hanson and Philip Serrell in Essex for auction in Kent. Can John outsmart his TV wife or will Sue win big? Hopefully, both teams will do well as all profits go to Children in Need.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Heavyweights Germaine Greer and Clive Anderson hit the shops of Lancashire with Charlie Ross and Charles Hanson looking for antiques to auction in Northwich. With trips to Chetham Library and Helmsmore Mill Museum, who will win the day?

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Stage and screen stars Stefanie Powers and Don Warrington join Charles Hanson and Margie Cooper to make big profits buying and selling antiques. They go from Hertfordshire to auction in West Sussex, with magic and Mosquitos along the way.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Sheila Hancock takes on Sandi Toksvig around the Isle of Wight--Sheila's birthplace--visiting a globe-making firm and saucy postcard museum. Philip Serrell and David Barby lend a hand with buying and selling at auction in Tunbridge Wells.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Journalists Bill Turnbull and Louise Minchin, more used to the BBC Breakfast couch than antiquing, compete with the help of Philip Serrell and David Barby. They begin in greater Manchester and end up at auction in Bridgenorth, Shropshire.

programme.title: The Best of Steve Beaton: Top Moments & Highlights
programme.desc: Watch the best moments from Steve Beaton, showcasing his top highlights and unforgettable darts from his debut.

programme.title: Luke Littler - One Year On
programme.desc: A documentary on Luke Littler's meteoric rise to World Champion, featuring exclusive insights.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk: Lisa Ashton
programme.desc: Lisa Ashton joins Chris Murphy and Matthew Edgar on Tungsten Talk to reflect on her remarkable career.

programme.title: Best of the MODUS Super Series
programme.desc: Watch Darius Labanauskas face Tom Sykes in this thrilling full match from the Series 9 Champions Night Final!

programme.title: The Vault
programme.desc: Full session replay of Series 4: Champions Night, featuring Luke Littler, Colin Osborne, and more!

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jordan & Austin
programme.desc: After two years of chatting, Jordan believes Austin is the one. But every time they arrange to meet, Austin cancels. Can Julie and Oobah finally bring them together? (S1, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Rob & Sarah
programme.desc: Oobah is joined by Nathan Henry to help Rob track down his soulmate, Sarah. After two and a half years, Sarah has suddenly gone quiet and it's up to Oobah and Nathan to investigate. (S2, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Chloe and Jordan are living their best lives on holiday in Corfu. Shannon asks Charlie to move in. Sassi goes through with the big operation and Amber tries to stay positive about the baby. (S6, ep6)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Sassi and Darren watch Zena'ya take to the catwalk. Shannon plans a family photoshoot but Charlie doesn't go. Chloe chops off Marley's hair for charity. Amber hits an all time low. (S6, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: The girls are back and like you've never seen them before. Megan is loved up, Chloe is heart broken, Amber is about to drop and there's a new girl on the block! (S7, ep1)

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A defense team and cutting-edge forensic animators strategize to defend a young woman accused of murder.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder by Design
programme.desc: Investigators question whether designer Gianni Versace was the random victim of a killing spree, or he knew the man who shot him to death.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Amanda Knox: The Untold Story
programme.desc: The story of Amanda Knox, an American exchange student who was convicted, along with her Italian boyfriend, Raffaelle Sollecito, of murdering Amanda’s British roommate, Meredith Kercher in 2007.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: In 1986, 21-year-old Mitzi Nalley was brutally murdered in her Austin, Texas home. Police arrested Jonathan Wayne Nobles, who confessed to the crime and was sentenced to the death penalty.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Thomas Capano, a successful Delaware lawyer lived a double life, a devoted family man while having affairs. When Anne Marie Fahey, one of these women, mysteriously disappeared police were at first stumped. Finally evidence led to Capano.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Ghosts of Mississippi
programme.desc: A report on a string of unsolved homicides in Columbus, Mississippi. Five elderly residents, all living within a mile of each other, were killed within 18 months. Police say, a terrified community believes a serial killer is on the loose.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: F.B.I. Agent Dale Cooper comes to the logging town of Twin Peaks to investigate the murder of Laura Palmer, a beautiful and popular high school student. While investigating, Agent Cooper slowly learns that strange things are happening.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: F.B.I. Agent Dale Cooper comes to the logging town of Twin Peaks to investigate the murder of Laura Palmer, a beautiful and popular high school student. While investigating, Agent Cooper slowly learns that strange things are happening.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Agent Cooper enjoys the comforts of the Great Northern Hotel. Bobby Briggs and Mike Nelson are released from jail. Doctor Hayward hands over the autopsy report on Laura Palmer.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Ben Horne's brother, Jerry, arrives in Twin Peaks; James and Donna decide to be together. Ben and Jerry travel to One Eyed Jacks and meet with it's madam, Blackie O'Reilly. Audrey leaves a clue for Cooper.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: The next morning, Cooper meets with Audrey, who confesses to leaving him the note about One Eyed Jacks. Cooper tells Truman he can't remember who the killer was in his dream, but insists the dream is a code to solving the crime.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper questions Dr. Jacoby, who suspects Leo Johnson is the killer. Cooper's supervisor, Gordon Cole, calls in with Albert's report. Josie Packard spies on Ben Horne and Catherine Martell. Hawk tracks down the One Armed Man.
